title: Chao Mini Zhanshi
title_japanese: 超迷你战士 第二季
synopsis: Too bad to run? Always forget the east and the west! It turns out that the troubles of humans may not be caused by themselves, but by the troubled stars! Fortunately, the baby girl doctor with an IQ of 500 used courage and happy energy to create "Super Mini Warrior" to help humans defeat troubles! Although he temporarily defeated the nasty Annoying Starman in the final battle, a new and more powerful Annoying Starman is here again. It is said that he never makes mistakes and is perfect! At the same time, Doctor Girl is facing a new challenge, with a red hair, the strongest primary school student on the surface appeared! Is he an enemy or a friend when he is aggressive? Faced with constantly emerging troubles and challenges, Mini Yong and Mini Moe have risen to the challenge, while working hard to evolve themselves, while constantly fighting for humanity! Are you worried? Quickly call the super mini warrior and defeat your troubles! (translated from qq)
